title: Learn
description: Explore information, tips, and resources to help you feel confident and stronger in your caregiver role.

topics_description.description: Your starting place for navigating home care, understanding the roles of home care providers, and preparing for common challenges.
Learn about ways to protect your health and avoid stress and burnout while caring for others.
Discover tips and tools to manage COPD, heart failure, and dizziness symptoms in the home.
Use a validated health assessment and an appointment planning tool to share important information with healthcare professionals.
